title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok after setting the classpath and output location, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are treated as two separate operations. By setting the output location before setting the classpath, it creates an illegal state.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set the output location for the project. 2. Set the classpath for the project. 3. Press Ok. The error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src' should be displayed.
